title: claaassssic
body:
Game 1
Xunthrae: gank
Xunthrae: what are you doing
Xunthrae:  its a pantheon :(
Xunthrae: ur reported
Xunthrae: report corki
Xunthrae: called me %%%got
Xunthrae: ty
Xunthrae: yah
Xunthrae: wonder why
Xunthrae: 4got its a pantheon
Xunthrae: mb
Xunthrae: kalye feeding har
Xunthrae: 4 what
Xunthrae: ?
Xunthrae: o sorry its a pantheon
Xunthrae: i had to mute
Xunthrae: much more quiet
Xunthrae: gj
Xunthrae: gj
Xunthrae: noo u cant
Xunthrae: get over it
Xunthrae: u cant gank
Xunthrae: good
Xunthrae: not like it matters
Xunthrae: VI CARRY SO HARD
Xunthrae: I have same mount of deaths im nottt inting
Xunthrae: o wlel
Xunthrae: i left my safe space a while back
Xunthrae: nt
Xunthrae: u cant carry vi
Xunthrae: do u understand?
Xunthrae: thats what they all say
Xunthrae: please report corki for calling me a %%%got
Xunthrae: please report
Xunthrae: lol
Xunthrae: u
Xunthrae: ok
Xunthrae: reminder
Xunthrae: leona has the same record
Xunthrae: just saying
Xunthrae: well their comp is better than ours
Xunthrae: if u cant tell
Xunthrae: gg
Xunthrae: my fault guys
Xunthrae: ooopps
Xunthrae: totally

replies.body: You got a restriction for spewing stupidity, congrats?
explain

What needs explaining?
 You spewed stupidity. thus you got wrecked. Next time, to avoid getting wrecked, do not spew stupidity.

Telling people to report others or threatening them with reports is harassment and punishable. (number of reports makes zero difference, all it does is flag a review of the game).
Spamming the same meaningless things over and over is punishable.

Honestly, spelling and grammar that awful should be punishable too, but riot cant alienate their non adult playerbase.

oops sorry, i didn't know that saying report, someone twice is spewing stupidity.. again twice. That is not spamming....... you're argument is that i spammed report when if you really read i said it twice.

Xunthrae: ur reported
Xunthrae: report corki
Xunthrae: please report corki for calling me a %%%got
Xunthrae: please report

I understand that you are probably too young to understand or be responsible for your own behavior, but here is a tip: semantics wont help you in the real world, you get judged by your actions, not by how you can twist words. Unless you are a lawyer.
You did it, you get to take responsibility for it. Nobody will believe you if you say you did not do something that is on record, only people as critically retarded as donald trump get to do that (and nobody believes them, still).

Xunthrae: ur reported in team chat

Xunthrae: report corki in all chat

Xunthrae: please report corki for calling me a %%%got in all chat 15 minutes later

Xunthrae: please report when the game ended. 

That is not my action its someone else and i just projected to the other team what my teammate was saying. that  and you mention subtlely your political views which is pretty pathetic. and your use of the word semantics have to do with anything? 

semantics: the branch of linguistics and logic concerned with meaning. There are a number of branches and subbranches of semantics, including formal semantics, which studies the logical aspects of meaning, such as sense, reference, implication, and logical form, lexical semantics, which studies word meanings and word relations, and conceptual semantics, which studies the cognitive structure of meaning.


you have to understand. i did not say this it was my teammate and i was telling the other team what had happened. i was not changing words i was not scapegoating, that is just what he had said. And i was judging my teammate who said that because if wasn't offensive to me but i just like seeing people getting banned. And again.... i was not spamming report which was your argument earlier. 

"PLEASE REPORT REPORTED PLEASE REPORT MY TEAM REPORT REPORT REPORT"

Hint. Didnt do that

TL:DR your argument is invalid
TL:DR asking for reports is against the rules,and thus you were punished.
i would like to know in the summoners code where that is. i agree with u i just want to know where it is

It's considered harassment and flaming because 
1) only 1 report is needed to trigger a punishment 
and 2) no one can verify why you're asking for reports, so it can be used to harrass someone who wasn't toxic. 
Thus, it falls under:
[Summoner's Code](http://gameinfo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/get-started/summoners-code/)
1) Support Your Team
2) Drive Constructive Feedback
4) Enjoy Yourself, but not at Anyone Else's Expense
i said why im asking for a report in chat twice. Btw they look at the chat logs of the other people when looking at bans that are 14 days soooo
You said why, but you can't _prove it_. That's what makes it harassment. It's been said repeatedly by rioters on this board that asking for reports = harassment. Period.

wow you are all rude the guy calls him a %%%got that is something punishable and he says to report and you all call him a idiot and toxic for saying that someone who deserved to be reported should be reported cuz he said it 4 times hey guys Donald trump is horrible why is he winning vote for the other side sorry said it to many times now we got a near Hitler for president I wouldn't be surprised if he declared war on other countries
Its pretty pitiful to see you talking about me being a "non-adult" when your name is magicflyingllama

I use this username because it causes prepubescent brats to get angry, for some reason. 
I have no idea why (not enough edgy Xx?), but i thank the firefall random name generator.

Also i like the copypaste definition of semantics, which you apparently did not understand, since you delivered a hilarious and completely pointless objective argument directly after. 
Riot, or anyone else, does not care why you are toxic and what excuses you make up, but your attitude speaks for itself.

Bring on the ad hominem, bratling.
u lost its k
What did i loose?
everything.... U argued with a "non-adult" for this long lmao. how insecure are you really?

your rude this guy didn't do anything wrong he simply said to report the guy who called him a %%%got but no he said it multiple times now he's reported that's how it should work totally oh what's this bad grammar banned for life

"PLEASE REPORT REPORTED PLEASE REPORT MY TEAM REPORT REPORT REPORT"







...thats why
i said that twicceeee
Nah more than that

Calling for reports is considered harassment and doesn't solve anything either since it only takes one report to flag a game for review. If someone is being toxic then just mute, report and move on rather than constantly harass them over it and make the situation worse. This is only one game though and you should have two additional games to show as well (you can find them in your game client) so please post them here if you're truly looking for a full review of your case.
